# LinearPCMFormatFlagIsBigEndian

**Enumeration Case**

A flag to indicate whether PCM samples use big-endian values.

## Declaration

```swift
LinearPCMFormatFlagIsBigEndian
```

## Discussion

This flag is a synonym of [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsBigEndian].

## Endianness Flags

- **FormatFlagIsBigEndian**: A flag to indicate whether samples use big-endian values.
- **FormatFlagsNativeEndian**: A flag to indicate whether samples use the platform’s native endianness for its values.
